Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Bordeaux Bayonne Etche-Ona, you'll be centrally located in Bordeaux, steps from Notre Dame Church and Les Grands Hommes. This hotel is within close proximity of Grand Theater Opera National of Bordeaux and Bordeaux Wine School.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 61 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Bordeaux? This hotel has facilities measuring 1615 square feet (150 square meters), including conference space.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:30 PM Check-out time is 11:30 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at Best Western Bordeaux Bayonne Etche-Ona, you'll be centrally located in Bordeaux, steps from Notre Dame Church and Les Grands Hommes. This hotel is within close proximity of Grand Theater Opera National of Bordeaux and Bordeaux Wine School.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Notre Dame Church - 0 km / 0 mi
Les Grands Hommes - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Grand Theater Opera National of Bordeaux - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Bordeaux Wine School - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi

Place des Quinconces - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Place Gambetta - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi

Cinema Utopia - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Decoratives Arts Museum - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Vinet Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Bordeaux (ZFQ-Saint-Jean SNCF Train Station) - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Bordeaux (BOD-Merignac) - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Bordeaux Bayonne Etche-Ona is Bordeaux (BOD-Merignac).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
